s1_title: Wi-Fi 智能插座 自带可调光小夜灯
s1_text:
随时随地打开和关闭已连接的电器。
电量消耗情况，随时掌握。
晚上还可为您照亮前方。
s2_text: 语音控制，解放双手。生活更简单。
s3_text: 语音控制，解放双手。生活更简单。
s4_title: 创建场景 同时控制
s4_text: 在iOS设备上，使用场景可以同时控制多个支持HomeKit的配件。
s5_text: Set timers for lights, humidifiers, fans, and other vital devices via Koogeek Home app. Wake up with lights-on and coffee ready in the morning. (Note: Not support Android devices)
s6_text1: For iOS devices only, you can set up your Apple TV (with tvOS 10.1 or later) or iPad (with iOS 10.1 or later) as a home hub, then you can control connected devices from anywhere.
s6_text2: Or configure the Alexa connection, then wherever you have Internet access (over cellular data or Wi-Fi), you can directly control and monitor connected devices with either iOS devices or Android devices from anywhere, no hub required.
s7_text: With configuring the Alexa connection, the ON/OFF status and control of connected devices can be synced and shared across iOS devices and Android devices.
s8_text: The LED night light is built in the outlet, which also works with Apple Homekit and Alexa. You can ask Siri or Alexa to turn on/off the night light and set the brightness.
s9_text: Want to gain insight into the power consumption? Check real-time power consumption and monitor daily and monthly electric power consumption via the Koogeek Home app on your iOS devices. (Note: Not support Android devices)
s10_title: Create A Unified Ecosystem with Others
s10_text: All HomeKit-enabled accessories are compatible with each other. Include D-Link security camera, Hunter Ceiling Fan, Apple HomePod and other accessories from over 30 brands worldwide. Koogeek works with all of them to create your home system.
